synopsis.text:
Libraâ€™s mission is to maintain harmony in a world where humans and supernatural creatures coexist, following the unexpected merging of New York City with the Beyond. This secret organization is composed of unique individuals with extraordinary abilities, and they find themselves joined by an unsuspecting amateur photographer, Leonardo Watch.

Leo's life takes a dramatic turn when he acquires the divine "All-seeing Eyes of the Gods" in exchange for his sister's sight. Driven by the desire to restore his sister's vision, Leo ventures into the bustling city of Hellsalem's Lot, where he crosses paths with Libra. As he becomes entangled with this eclectic group, Leo embarks on a journey to uncover the truth behind the mysterious powers he now possesses.

In this new reality, Leo and his enigmatic teammates must navigate a world filled with supersonic monkeys, vampires, talking fishmen, and other extraordinary beings. Together, they strive to prevent chaos from spreading beyond the city's impenetrable bubble and to the rest of the world. As Leo's adventures unfold, he discovers that his once ordinary life has transformed into an extraordinary existence filled with danger, mystery, and the unimaginable.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
